column4: if the upgrade from 10.10 to 11.04 is completed can I repair it? After pressing OK it didn't make the cleanup process.
if the upgrade from 10.10 to 11.04 is completed with errors can I repair it? After pressing OK it didn't make the cleanup process. (sorry for the double post)
to fix broken packages: sudo apt-get install -f
it does not have any broken packages, just completed with errors without cleaning non-required packages, and the problem is that I can't find what package/s produced the problem.
